item.title: ‘I’m rich in everything but parents’: I inherited $400K. Is it unwise to use this money to buy a house with my fiancé?
item.description: “I’m a 40-year-old woman in a committed relationship, and I’ve experienced the loss of both of my parents.”

item.title: Gold now down nearly $1,000 from peak as silver attempts to stabilize following record 31% slump
item.description: A volatile day is setting up for precious and base metals on Monday with silver and China selling in focus.

item.title: Michael Saylor’s Strategy sees bitcoin holdings trade below purchase price
item.description: The bitcoin holdings of Michael Saylor’s Strategy were briefly underwater in a sign of the unwinding in cryptocurrency value this year.

item.title: Oil prices are falling sharply. Lowered U.S.-Iran tensions and metals spillover is being blamed.
item.description: Oil prices fell sharply on Monday after President Donald Trump said he was hopeful over negotiations with Iran, taking some of the fear premium out of...

item.title: ‘Hell of a story, isn’t it?’: My brother stole $500K from my ailing father. Can we get justice?
item.description: “I split our father’s estate on the understanding that no such $500,000 transfer had been made.”
